title: The Life Of Ram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Karai Vandha Pirage
pidikkithu kadalai
narai vandha pirage
puriyuthu ulagai

netrin inbangal
yaavum koodiye..hey..
indre ippothu
artham aakkuthe.

indrin ippothin
inbam yaavume..
naalai or artham
kaattume...

vaazhaa en
vazhvai vazhavey.
thaazhaamal
mele pogiren.

theeraa ul
ootrai theendave.
indre ingae meelgiren.
indre ingae aazhgiren.

yaaro pol
naan ennai paarkkiren
yedhum illaamale
iyalbaai
sudar pol
thelivaai..

naane illaatha
aazhathil
naan vazhgiren.
kannaadiyai pirindhe
kaangindra ellaamum
naanaagiren.

iru kaalin idaiyile
urasum poonaiyaai
vazhkai podhum adadaa.
edhir kaanum yaavume
theenda thoondum azhagaai

naane naanaai iruppen
naalil pooraai vasaippen
pole vazhnthe salikkum
vazhvai marakkiren.

vaagaai vaagaai vazhgiren.
paagaai paagai aagiren.

tho kaatrodu
vallooruthaan poguthe
paathai illaamale
azhagaai.
nigazhe adhuvaai.

neerin aazhathil
pogindra kal polave.
osai ellaam thurandhe
kaangindra kaatchikul
naan moozhginen.

thimileri kaalai mel
thoongum kaagamaai
boomi meedhu iruppen.
puvi pogum poakkil
naanum kaikorthu nadappen.

yedho eagam ezhuthe
aahaa aazham tharuthe
thaai pol vaazhum ganame
aaro paaduthe
aaro aariraariro
aaro aariraariro

seo.title: The Life Of Ram Song Lyrics
seo.description: The Life Of Ram Song Lyrics - Tamil song lyrics from 96 Movie
